review: I love the Amazon Fire Stick. The set up is simple and because I ordered it with my Amazon account the device was already registered to my account so all I had to was connect it to the internet. Right out of the box I can control the Fire Stick with either my my Fire Phone or the Fire HDX without the need to download a secondary app. The device has a simple streamlined menu and allows you to download apps like PBS, HBO GO, and Netflix only if you want them unlike other devices liek the Apple TV which comes preloaded on it and you can't get rid of it. Also you can play games on it. The device also had seamless streaming and as long as the internet co0nnection is great no buffering.
